original: The dog is roaming around restlessly
translate: The dog is roaming around restlessly

original: A guardsman dressed in the livery of the noble house Berryn scowls at you
translate: A guardsman dressed in the livery of the noble house Berryn scowls at you

original: Armsmaster Lyra awaits you at the main entrance
translate: Armsmaster Lyra awaits you at the main entrance

original: You best talk to her if you've not already done so
translate: You'd best talk to her if you've not already done so

original: A ragged, hungry refugee from Horryn
translate: A ragged, hungry refugee from Horryn

original: The mercenary looks at you, menacingly
translate: The mercenary looks at you, menacingly

original: The scarred and graying veteran smiles varmly towards you
translate: The scarred, greying veteran gives you a cordial and familial smile

original: The imposing cleric turns to face you
translate: The imposing cleric turns to face you

original: There's a steely resolve in her eyes, but she gives you a warm, if sad smile by way of greeting
translate: There's a steely resolve in her eyes, but she gives you a warm, if sad smile by way of greeting

original: Chamberlain to the governor of Idra
translate: Chamberlain to the governor of Idra

original: {addVocalBarkLocal|I've too much on my mind right now...}
translate: {addVocalBarkLocal|I've too much on my mind right now...}

original: A ragged man, caked in dirt
translate: A ragged man, caked in dirt

original: On your way through the refugee camp you notice a woman and a pale-looking child huddled together beneath an old, worn blanket
translate: On your way through the refugee camp a woman and a pale-looking child huddled together beneath an old, worn blanket catches your eye

original: She's ragged and far to lean but she is smiling from ear to ear as she clutches her stuffed animal
translate: Her gaunt face wears a from ear to ear as she clutches her stuffed animal with untold affection

original: She's ragged and far to lean and looks like she's been crying recently
translate: The bones of the haggard girl poke through tattered rags. It looks like she's been crying recently, too

original: The man called "Snow" by his crew, was once the first mate of the Zephyr
translate: The once first mate of the Zephyr, named "Snow" by the crew

original: One of the wretched surviors from the Zephyr
translate: One of the wretched survivors from the Zephyr

original: The woman looks torn, tattered and exhausted
translate: The woman looks torn, tattered and exhausted

original: As you approach, she offers a tired, but grateful smile
translate: As you approach, she offers a weary but grateful smile

original: The man looks torn, tattered and exhausted
translate: The man looks torn; tattered and exhausted

original: As you approach the sailor shrinks back in terror whilst avoiding your gaze
translate: The sailor shrinks in terror as you approach, avoiding your gaze

original: As you approach the sailor offers a tired, but grateful smile
translate: As you approach the sailor, he offers a tired but grateful smile
